subcategory.name: Testimonials
subcategory.description: Testimonial examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS testimonial examples to add social proof to your website and build trust with your visitors. These testimonial examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
